00038 #ifndef EGS_VECTOR_
00039 #define EGS_VECTOR_
00040 
00041 #include "egs_libconfig.h"
00042 
00043 #include "egs_math.h"
00044 
00055 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_Vector {
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059     EGS_Float x; 
00060     EGS_Float y; 
00061     EGS_Float z; 
00062 
00063     EGS_Vector(EGS_Float xx, EGS_Float yy, EGS_Float zz) : x(xx), y(yy), z(zz) {};
00064     EGS_Vector(const EGS_Vector &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {};
00065     EGS_Vector() : x(0), y(0), z(0) {};
00066 
00067     EGS_Vector &operator=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00068         x = v.x;
00069         y = v.y;
00070         z = v.z;
00071         return *this;
00072     };
00073 
00074     // EGS_Vector additions
00075     //
00076     EGS_Vector operator+(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00077         return EGS_Vector(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z);
00078     };
00079     EGS_Vector &operator+=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00080         x += v.x;
00081         y += v.y;
00082         z += v.z;
00083         return *this;
00084     };
00085 
00086     // EGS_Vector substractions
00087     //
00088     EGS_Vector operator-(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00089         return EGS_Vector(x-v.x,y-v.y,z-v.z);
00090     }
00091     EGS_Vector &operator-=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00092         x -= v.x;
00093         y -= v.y;
00094         z -= v.z;
00095         return *this;
00096     };
00097 
00098     // EGS_Vector multiplications
00099     //
00100     EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Float f) const {
00101         return EGS_Vector(x*f,y*f,z*f);
00102     };
00103     EGS_Vector &operator*=(const EGS_Float f) {
00104         x *= f;
00105         y *= f;
00106         z *= f;
00107         return *this;
00108     };
00109     friend EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float f, EGS_Vector &v) {
00110         return v*f;
00111     };
00112     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00113         return x*v.x + y*v.y + z*v.z;
00114     };
00115 
00116     // vector product
00117     EGS_Vector times(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00118         return EGS_Vector(y*v.z-z*v.y, z*v.x-x*v.z, x*v.y-y*v.x);
00119     };
00120     EGS_Vector operator%(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00121         return EGS_Vector(y*v.z-z*v.y, z*v.x-x*v.z, x*v.y-y*v.x);
00122     };
00123 
00124     // scale
00125     EGS_Vector getScaled(const EGS_Vector &s) const {
00126         return EGS_Vector(x*s.x,y*s.y,z*s.z);
00127     };
00128     void scale(const EGS_Vector &s) {
00129         x *= s.x;
00130         y *= s.y;
00131         z *= s.z;
00132     };
00133 
00134     // Some other useful methods.
00135     EGS_Float length() const {
00136         return sqrt(x*x+y*y+z*z);
00137     };
00138     EGS_Float length2() const {
00139         return x*x+y*y+z*z;
00140     };
00141     void normalize() {
00142         EGS_Float tmp = 1./length();
00143         x *= tmp;
00144         y *= tmp;
00145         z *= tmp;
00146     };
00147 
00148     void rotate(EGS_Float cos_t, EGS_Float sin_t,
00149                 EGS_Float c_phi, EGS_Float s_phi) {
00150         EGS_Float sin_z = x*x + y*y;
00151         if (sin_z > 1e-10) {
00152             sin_z = sqrt(sin_z);
00153             EGS_Float temp = sin_t/sin_z;
00154             EGS_Float temp_phi = z*c_phi;
00155             EGS_Float temp_x = x*cos_t;
00156             register EGS_Float temp_y = y*cos_t;
00157             EGS_Float temp_x1 = temp_phi*x-y*s_phi;
00158             EGS_Float temp_y1 = temp_phi*y+x*s_phi;
00159             x = temp*temp_x1+temp_x;
00160             y = temp*temp_y1+temp_y;
00161             z = z*cos_t-sin_z*sin_t*c_phi;
00162         }
00163         else {
00164             x = sin_t*c_phi;
00165             y = sin_t*s_phi;
00166             z *= cos_t;
00167         }
00168     };
00169 
00170 };
00171 
00172 #endif
